reviewText: A brilliant dvd bringing back fond memories of this series. Many Thanks.
So many great stunts. Very retro entertaining.
Some wild people are much more daring than I.

A bit dated but there are quite a few good stunts packed into this one. Grant and his associates carry out most of the action especially for this film as opposed to showing clips from other films. There are also the requisite interviews and background information. Very entertaining...
The Stunts and Grant Page combine for a nonstop thrillfest that can only be matched, maybe, by Brian Trenchard Smith's Stunt Rock (1979)

Better if it had audio...
Obviously nobody at Amazon is paying attention if this sort of thing can slip through.
